sentences.sContent: I always confounded him with his twin brother.
sentences.sContent_eng: I always confounded him with his twin brother.
sentences.sCn: 我总分不清他和他的孪生兄弟。

sentences.sContent: The twin brothers were removed from our class.
sentences.sContent_eng: The twin brothers were removed from our class.
sentences.sCn: 这一对孪生兄弟已从我们班转走。

sentences.sContent: The twin brothers bled for their country and died without any regrets.
sentences.sContent_eng: The twin brothers bled for their country and died without any regrets.
sentences.sCn: 这对孪生兄弟为国流血牺牲， 死而无憾。

sentences.sContent: ...People in our neighborhood find it hard to believe she's my twin sister...

phrases.pCn: 双螺旋桨；双推进器；双驱动桥
n. 同卵双生，全等双生

words.tran: 一胎双生的；成双成对的
